Teachers are needed, especially for the children, who are calm and kind, manifesting forbearance and love for the very ones who most need it. . . . Our church schools need teachers who have high moral qualities; those who can be trusted; those who are sound in the faith, and who have tact and 
                                                                           222
patience; those who walk with God, and abstain from the very appearance of evil.--"Testimonies for the Church," Vol. 6, pp. 200, 201.
